chinese: 快进来呀，Danny.坐吧.
english: Come on in, Danny. Have a seat.

chinese: Thanks.
english: Thanks.

chinese: 有什么事吗?
english: What's up?

chinese: 我不知道你对在公寓里养动物有没有什么特别的规定.
english: I was wondering if you had a particular policy about animals in the apartment.

chinese: 动物? 像臭虫一类的? 有害动物?
english: Animals? Like... bugs? Pests?

chinese: No, no. 我说的是宠物.
english: No, no. Pets.

chinese: Ahhh. 宠物.
english: Ahhh. Pets.

chinese: Yeah. 你看，我要是养一只宠物的话，
english: Yeah. See I think that if I got a pet,

chinese: 就会有助于我把注意力集中在某些除我自己和一些小问题以外的什么事上.
english: it would help me focus on something other than myself and my petty problems.

chinese: 听起来这对你好像是很重要的一步.
english: It sounds like this is an important step for you.

chinese: 再说，和我约会的这个女人很喜欢狗.
english: Also, this woman I'm seeing likes dogs.

chinese: 我懂了. Well, 如果你真要养狗的话，
english: I see. Well, if you got a dog,

chinese: 那我们得先谈好条件.
english: we would have to agree on some conditions.

chinese: -首先，不可以是小狗. -Oh.
english: -For one thing, it couldn't be a puppy. -Oh.

chinese: 小狗会把房间摘得乱七八糟的，
english: Puppies are very tough on apartments,

chinese: Danny. 它们需要你的时候你要是不在家的话，
english: Danny. If you're not home when they need you,

chinese: 你会有各种各样的问题. 乱糟糟哪，叫声哪.
english: you will have all kinds of problems. Messes. Crying.

chinese: 那其他动物怎么样?
english: What about other animals?

chinese: 你能讲得具体点吗?
english: Can you narrow it down a little?

chinese: 你感觉怎么样 如果我养一只猴子的话?
english: How would you feel if I got a monkey?

chinese: 养猴子是不行的.
english: A monkey would not be OK.

chinese: 那雪貂呢?
english: A ferret?

chinese: -雪貂不行. -大蟒蛇.
english: -No ferrets. -A boa constrictor.

chinese: 野生动物对我来说都有问题，Danny.
english: I have a problem with wild animals, Danny.

chinese: 如果的确要养宠物的话，
english: If there's going to be a pet at all,

chinese: 那也只能是驯化的宠物.
english: it will have to be a domesticated one.

chinese: 你觉得养条鱼怎么样?
english: How about a fish?

chinese: 养鱼好像有点违背了我养宠物的初衷.
english: A fish sort of defeats the purpose of having a pet.

chinese: 此话怎讲?
english: How so?

chinese: 你又不能用手去爱抚一条鱼.
english: You can't pet a fish.
